meta.name: description
meta.content: Corrigan-Camden Independent School District is located in the small, rural town of Corrigan in East Texas. The positive attitudes exhibited by school staff, community members, and students create a unique learning environment focusing on academic achievement of all students.

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Corrigan-Camden ISD, Corrigan, Camden, School, Technology
